data.name: Morgan Le Fay
data.description: A former pupil to Merlin, Morgan Le Fay is a dominating sorceress that uses her abilities to manipulate the past and present.

starItems.name: Morgan Le Fay
starItems.description: A former pupil to Merlin, Morgan Le Fay is a dominating sorceress that uses her abilities to manipulate the past and present.

3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Copy and clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>
On Crit, instead, copy and clear all positive effects

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + copy and clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
On Crit, instead, copy and clear all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from the primary target and redistribute to self

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + copy and clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
On Crit, instead, copy and clear all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from the primary target and redistribute to self.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + copy and clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
On Crit, instead, copy and clear all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from the primary target and redistribute to self.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Steal +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Health

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + copy and clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
On Crit, instead, copy and clear all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from the primary target and redistribute to self.

1.description:
Reduce Speed Bar for self, all allies, and all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect from all enemies.

This attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade: Clear all negative effects from self

2.description:
Reduce Speed Bar for self, all allies, and all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect from all enemies.
Clear all negative effects from self.

This attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade: Deal <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health, as damage, to all enemies

3.description:
Reduce Speed Bar for self, all allies, and all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect from all enemies.
Clear all negative effects from self.
Deal <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health, as damage, to all enemies.

This attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects from all enemies

4.description:
Reduce Speed Bar for self, all allies, and all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects from all enemies.
Clear all negative effects from self.
Deal <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health, as damage, to all enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
Heal self for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health
Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies

5.description:
Reduce Speed Bar for self, all allies, and all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects from all enemies.
Clear all negative effects from self.
Heal self for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Deal <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health, as damage, to all enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade: Deal +<color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health

6.description:
Reduce Speed Bar for self, all allies, and all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects from all enemies.
Clear all negative effects from self.
Heal self for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Deal <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health, as damage, to all enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
Clear all positive effects from all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Reduce Speed Bar for self, all allies, and all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
Clear all positive effects from all enemies.
Clear all negative effects from self.
Heal self for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Deal <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health, as damage, to all enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies.

This attack is unavoidable.
7.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to an Apocalypse ally and all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies

item.name: Morgan Le Fay's Special Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Reduce Speed Bar for self, all allies, and all enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
Clear all positive effects from all enemies.
Clear all negative effects from self.
Heal self for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Deal <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health, as damage, to all enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn to self, an Apocalypse ally, all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies, and all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies.

This attack is unavoidable.

1.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
This attack has <color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

This attack cannot be dodged.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>125%</color> Piercing.
This attack has <color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

This attack cannot be dodged.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Crit Chance
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the primary target

3.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>175%</color> Piercing.
This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the primary target.

This attack cannot be dodged.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Spread all negative effects from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color> or <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>

4.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>225%</color> Piercing.
This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the primary target.
Spread all negative effects from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color> or <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects on all non-<color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies

5.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>275%</color> Piercing.
This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the primary target.
Spread all negative effects from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color> or <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects on all non-<color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies.

This attack cannot be dodged.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Reduce Speed Bar of all enemies that do not have any negative effects by <color=#86e619>30%</color>

6.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>325%</color> Piercing.
This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the primary target.
Spread all negative effects from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color> or <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects on all non-<color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies.

Reduce Speed Bar of all enemies that do not have any negative effects by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Extra Crit Chance
Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies

7.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>325%</color> Piercing.
This attack has <color=#86e619>50%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to the primary target.
Spread all negative effects from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color> or <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies.
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects on all non-<color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies.

Reduce Speed Bar of all enemies that do not have any negative effects by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Barrier. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Barrier.
1.nextUpgrade: Lower the Assist Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally, up to a max of <color=#86e619>100%</color>

2.description:
Lower the Assist Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally, up to a max of <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Barrier. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Barrier.
2.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance
<color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health

3.description:
Lower the Assist Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally, up to a max of <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Barrier. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Barrier.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health
On Spawn, Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies
On Spawn, Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy, up to a max of <color=#86e619>20%</color>

4.description:
On Spawn:
 > Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies
 > Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy, up to a max of <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Lower the Assist Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally, up to a max of <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Barrier. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Barrier.
4.nextUpgrade:
On enemy Turn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies
<color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health

5.description:
On Spawn:
> Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health
> Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies
> Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy, up to a max of <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

On enemy Turn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies.

Lower the Assist Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally, up to a max of <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Barrier. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Barrier.
5.nextUpgrade:
Apocalypse and all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health
Apocalypse and all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance

item.name: Morgan Le Fay's Passive Awakened Ability Material
item.description: Used to further upgrade character abilities.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

6.description:
On Spawn:
> Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health
> Apply <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies
> Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy, up to a max of <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

On enemy Turn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies.

Lower the Assist Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally, up to a max of <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. Apocalypse and all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance. Apocalypse and all <color=#fff568>HORSEMAN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Barrier. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Barrier.
